title: 怎么禁止Builder组的改名权限和彩色自体权限
author: 部落领袖

replies.author: sanityko
replies.txt_content:
部落领袖 发表于 2015-1-13 12:56
Mangaddp和mangdelp是什么区别？
mangaddp是给指定添加权限 mangdelp则是删除权限   在权限节点前加个 - 号相当于剥夺权限

所以你可以选择/mangaddp builder -essentials.nick或/manudelp builder essentials.nick

replies.author: SkyCatcher
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 SkyCatcher 于 2015-1-13 12:13 编辑 

/manuaddp builder -essentials.nick
/manuaddp builder -essentials.chat.color

replies.author: 西瓜太郎
replies.txt_content: 修改GroupManager文件夹内的globalgroups文件内builder权限组的权限essentials.nick和essentials.chat.color

replies.author: sanityko
replies.txt_content:
SkyCatcher 发表于 2015-1-13 08:01
/manuaddp builder essentials.nick
/manuaddp builder essentials.chat.color
怎么看都觉得要用mangdelp 或者mangaddp 然后权限节点前面加-吧

replies.author: 琥珀剑心
replies.txt_content:
前面那位老兄打反了

/mangdelp builder essentials.nick
/mangdelp builder essentials.chat.color

replies.author: 部落领袖
replies.txt_content:

怎么看都觉得要用mangdelp 或者mangaddp 然后权限节点前面加-吧
